Core

Interface AgentAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BestAgent, ThrashAgent, Thresh1, TimeAgent

    public interface AgentAPI

      • getCutoffValue

        double getCutoffValue()
        Return the "relative zero". All values below this will be considered zero.
        Returns:
        Cutoff factor

      • getVetoVal

        double getVetoVal()
        Reject all bids below this value. The opponent can still accept our offers though!
        Returns:
        The Veto value.
